data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 25,274 believers in Fars and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Fars, Iran
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Fars, Iran to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Fars, Iran find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Fars to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Fars. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Fars hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the state of Fars, Iran has a population of 4,851,300.

We estimate Fars has 25,274 people who might know Jesus, 65,511 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,760,516 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Fars, Iran know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
